config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		allData = 1
		
		col = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
		if not col:
			system.perspective.print("NO COLUMN SELECTED")
			allData = 0
		
		bin = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
		if not bin:
			system.perspective.print("NO BIN SELECTED")
			allData = 0
		
		date = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value
		if not date:
			system.perspective.print("NO DATE SELECTED")
			allData = 0
		
		participant = self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id
		if not participant:
			system.perspective.print("NO PARTICIPANT SELECTED")
			allData = 0
		
		if allData == 0:
			return 
		
		currentTime = system.date.now()
		params = {'action'       : '2000-01-01',
				  'column'       : col,
				  'bin'          : bin,
				  'employeeId'   : '',
				  'participantId': participant,
				  'date'         : date,
				  'timeCreated'  : currentTime}
		
		system.perspective.print("=========StorageBin Insert params=========")
		system.perspective.print(params)	
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Participants/Storage Bins/InsertBinAction', params)
		
		
		system.perspective.sendMessage('storage_bin_refresh', payload = {})
	
	except:
		system.perspective.print('ERROR OCCURED WHILE TRYING TO SAVE. Details below.')
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())

self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = self.props.data[event.row]['col']
	self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = self.props.data[event.row]['bin']
	self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.props.data[event.row]['exp']
	
	self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id = self.props.data[event.row]['id']
	self.view.params.Selected_Participant = self.props.data[event.row]['pname']

transforms.code:
# val has: id action actionDate col bin participantId pfname pmname plname employeeId efname emname elname
	# res has: [id] pname column bin start exp exit evict sname
	result = []
	
	for i in value:
		cline = {} # Current Line
		cline['id']  = i['id']
		cline['bin'] = i['bin']
		cline['col'] = i['col']
		action = system.date.getDayOfMonth(system.date.fromMillis(i['action']))
		cline['exit'] = ''
		cline['evict'] = ''
		acdate = system.date.fromMillis(i['actionDate'])
		if action == 1:
			cline['start'] = acdate
			cline['exp']   = system.date.addDays(cline['start'], 30)
		else:
			params = {
				'bin': i['bin'],
				'col': i['col']
			}
			res = system.db.runNamedQuery('Participants/Storage Bins/GetSpecificBinFullStatus', params)
			
			cline['start'] = res.getValueAt(1,1) 
			cline['exp']   = system.date.addDays(cline['start'], 30)
			if action == 2:
				cline['exit']  = acdate
			elif action == 3:
				cline['evict'] = acdate
		cline['pname'] = getName(i['pfname'], i['pmname'], i['plname'])
		cline['ename'] = getName(i['efname'], i['emname'], i['elname'])
		
		
		#### apply filters ###
		excludeRow = False
		# bin status - 0-active, 1-inactive, 2-both
		binStatusFilter = self.parent.getChild("Filters").getChild("BinStatis").props.params.selection
		binExpired = system.date.isAfter(cline['exp'], system.date.now())
		if binStatusFilter == 0 and not binExpired:
			excludeRow = True
		elif binStatusFilter == 1 and binExpired:
			excludeRow = True
		
		if not excludeRow:
			# return cline
			result.append(cline)		
	return result

def getName(fname, mname, lname):
	name = ''
	if fname:
		name += fname + ' '
	if mname:
		name += mname + ' '
	if lname:
		name += lname + ' '
	return name[:-1]
